answerText: Generation of 1898[10] One of the foremost authors of the Generation of '98 was this man, who imagined Augusto's love for Eugenia before debating committing suicide with this man in his novel Mist.  He also wrote Abel Sanchez.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 2 | 21 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One writer associated with this movement was Ramon del Valle-Inclan, whose dramas include Divine Words and Bohemian Lights.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this Spanish literary movement, based around Castile, that is sometimes conflated with modernismo and is named for the year in which it began.
